# changeBackgroundCellMask

**Type Property**

Same as `NSChangeGrayCellMask`, but only background pixels are changed.

## Declaration

```swift
static var changeBackgroundCellMask: NSCell.StyleMask { get }
```

## Constants

- **pushInCellMask**: The button cell “pushes in” if it has a border.
- **contentsCellMask**: The button cell displays its alternate icon and/or title.
- **changeGrayCellMask**: The button cell swaps the “control color” (the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSColor/controlColor] method of `NSColor`) and white pixels on its background and icon.
